items.section: return and refund policies > eligibility and timeline > Return Window
items.text: Customers have up to 30 days from the date of delivery to request a return or exchange.

items.section: return and refund policies > eligibility and timeline > Condition
items.text: Items must be unused, in their original packaging, and include all tags and proof of purchase.

items.section: return and refund policies > eligibility and timeline > Non-Returnable Items
items.text: Products that are personalized, perishable, or marked as final sale are non-returnable.

items.section: return and refund policies > eligibility and timeline > Exceptions
items.text: For hygiene and safety reasons, certain personal care products, consumables, and digital downloads cannot be returned.

items.section: return and refund policies > process for returns > Initiating a Return
items.text: Contact customer support with your order ID and the reason for the return.

items.section: return and refund policies > process for returns > Initiating a Return
items.text: Documentation such as photos may be requested to confirm product condition.

items.section: return and refund policies > process for returns > Authorization
items.text: Once approved, you will receive a return authorization and instructions on shipping the item back.

items.section: return and refund policies > process for returns > Authorization
items.text: Returns sent without authorization may be refused.

items.section: return and refund policies > process for returns > Shipping Costs
items.text: We cover return shipping for items received damaged, defective, or incorrect.

items.section: return and refund policies > process for returns > Shipping Costs
items.text: For change-of-mind returns, customers may be responsible for return shipping and any restocking fees.

items.section: return and refund policies > refunds and exchanges > Modes of Refund
items.text: Refunds can be issued to the original payment method, as store credit, or by exchanging the item for another product.

items.section: return and refund policies > refunds and exchanges > Processing Time
items.text: Once the returned item passes inspection, refunds are processed within 7-10 business days.

items.section: return and refund policies > refunds and exchanges > Exchanges
items.text: Exchanges are subject to stock availability.

items.section: return and refund policies > refunds and exchanges > Exchanges
items.text: If the requested replacement is unavailable, a refund or store credit will be offered.

items.section: return and refund policies > customer responsibilities
items.text: Customers are expected to use products as intended and not abuse the return policy.

items.section: return and refund policies > customer responsibilities
items.text: Items should be repacked securely to prevent damage in transit.

items.section: return and refund policies > customer responsibilities
items.text: Including all original accessories and packaging helps expedite the inspection process.

items.section: cancellation rules > Policy
items.text: Customers may cancel an order before it has been shipped.

items.section: cancellation rules > Policy
items.text: Once delivered, the return policy applies.

items.section: cancellation rules > How to Cancel
items.text: Submit a cancellation request via customer support or your account dashboard using your order ID as soon as possible.

items.section: cancellation rules > Refund for Cancellations
items.text: If the order is still in processing, it will be cancelled and a refund issued.

items.section: cancellation rules > Refund for Cancellations
items.text: If payment has been captured, refunds are processed to the original payment method within 7-10 business days.

items.section: cancellation rules > Non-Cancellable Items
items.text: Customized products, gift cards, and clearance items are generally not eligible for cancellation.

items.section: cancellation rules > After Dispatch
items.text: Once an order has been shipped, it cannot be cancelled.

items.section: cancellation rules > After Dispatch
items.text: Instead, customers may initiate a return through the standard return process.

items.section: delivery timelines > Standard Shipping
items.text: Domestic orders shipped via standard shipping typically arrive within 5-7 business days.

items.section: delivery timelines > Express Shipping
items.text: Customers can choose express shipping for a faster delivery window of 3-5 business days.

items.section: delivery timelines > Processing Time
items.text: Orders are processed and dispatched within 24 hours of payment confirmation (excluding weekends and holidays).

items.section: delivery timelines > Processing Time
items.text: Orders placed after 4 p.m. are processed the next business day.

items.section: delivery timelines > Tracking
items.text: Once shipped, customers will receive a tracking link via email or SMS to monitor the shipment status in real time.

items.section: delivery timelines > Variability
items.text: Delivery timelines are estimates and may vary due to weather, unforeseen logistic issues, or regional restrictions.

items.section: delivery timelines > Variability
items.text: Remote locations may require additional transit time.

items.section: contact information
items.text: For questions about returns, refunds, cancellations, or delivery timelines, please contact our customer care team through the support portal or by emailing our helpdesk.

items.section: contact information
items.text: We aim to respond to all enquiries within one business day.
